briefTitle: A Study of Sitagliptin in Patients With Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus Who Have Inadequate Glycemic Control on Diet/Exercise Therapy (0431-054)(COMPLETED)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Patients have type 2 diabetes mellitus on diet/exercise therapy

Exclusion Criteria:

* Patients have type 1 diabetes mellitus

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in HbA1c at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: HbA1c is measured as a percent. Thus, this change from baseline reflects the Week 12 HbA1c percent minus the Week 0 HbA1c percent.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in Fasting Plasma Glucose at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 12 is defined as fasting plasma glucose at Week 12 minus fasting plasma glucose at Week 0.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change From Baseline in 2 Hour Postprandial Glucose at Week 12
outcomeMeasures.description: Change from baseline at Week 12 is defined as 2-hour postprandial glucose Week 12 minus 2-hour postprandial glucose Week 0.
